title: E-Learning System Development: Inductive Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learning systematic approaches for developing math-domain-specific e-learning systems, strengthening UML-based system design capabilities through inductive case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can design an e-learning system development lifecycle by applying the 2TUP process stages
Learners can model the system architecture of inductive learning scenarios using UML class/sequence diagrams
Learners can derive at least five specific e-learning system functionality examples based on mathematical problem-solving scenarios
Learners can iteratively improve system design proposals by reflecting formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
